snippet: President Obama intends to nominate Gen. Lloyd J. Austin III to be the top officer of the United States Central Command,  the Pentagon announced Thursday.
abstract: Pentagon announces that Pres Obama intends to nominate Gen Lloyd J Austin III to be top officer of United States Central Command, responsible for American military operations in Middle East and Southwest Asia.
lead_paragraph: President Obama intends to nominate Gen. Lloyd J. Austin III to be the top officer of the United States Central Command,  the Pentagon announced Thursday.

headline.seo: New U.S. Commander for the Middle East
